channel.title: Blueprints on HTTP Smith
channel.description: Recent content in Blueprints on HTTP Smith

item.title: Normale Cacheable Page
item.description: Basic description: The “usual” page is something that do not change much when published and can be cached in a CND or in the user browser. As caching is a notoriously complex topic, it is not we are not going to discuss cache policy. Headers header example value Description Content-Type text/html; charset=UTF-8 The document is a html and the character encoding is UTF-8 Etag meaningleshash A hash of the content
